# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a valuable asset. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $150, a special discount considering your potential for long-term partnership with us. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
